This page contains items known throughout the Lore.

[[toc]]

# Weapons
* [[The Blade of Amaranth]] - A powerful flower blade said to have been used by the Enderion of the previous kalpa.
* [[Eldenrung]] - A power draconic blade forged from the heart of the Great Jotungram.

# Armors
* [[Kataratch Armor]] - An armor gifted to [[Marcus Romulo]], forged from the body and soul of [[Kataratch]].
